tags: None
review: The doctor heard the entire observation I had for myself and then explained what could be the cause for it. The good part was, he gave me an option of either taking xray immediately or after a week's time citing it didn't seem alarming and hence we can take a week's time. I really appreciate the time he gave and the way he explained the problem and how I can take right measures.

tags: None
review: I booked appointment with Dr. Samarjit, but some other doctor was there, I guess he was not having experience n knowledge.
